channel.title: Applications of Integration on The Amateur Data Scientist
channel.description: Recent content in Applications of Integration on The Amateur Data Scientist

item.title: Areas of Bounded Regions
item.description: 1 Problems 1.1 Region in the Second Quadrant 1.2 Cubic Curve and Tangent 2 Solutions 2.1 Horizontal Strip 3 Between the Lines 4 Code for Plots 5 Reference 1 Problems 1.1 Region in the Second Quadrant Problem 17, page 255 in Simmons (2016) Find the area of the region in the second quadrant bounded by the \(x\)-axis and the parabolas \(y = x^2\) and \(y = \sqrt{x + 18}\).
